meanings.sent1: She disinvites him from the party.
meanings.sent2: He always disinvites people he doesn't like.
meanings.sent3: The cat disinvites the mouse from its cozy spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The storm disinvites any outdoor activities with its heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher disinvites distractions from her classroom.

meanings.sent1: They disinvites her to the gathering.
meanings.sent2: The exclusive club disinvites those who don't meet their criteria.
meanings.sent3: The treehouse disinvites anyone who can't climb up the ladder.
meanings.sent4: The closed door disinvites any unwanted guests.
meanings.sent5: The closed sign disinvites customers after hours.
